metadata.title: CVE-2020-6104 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An exploitable information disclosure vulnerability exists in theget_dnode_of_data functionality of F2fs-Tools F2fs.Fsck 1.13. A speciallycrafted f2fs filesystem can cause information disclosure resulting in ainformation disclosure. An attacker can provide a malicious file to triggerthis vulnerability.

criterions.comment: f2fs-tools: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
